item.description:
We've biked The Washington Secondary path before - it has a slight uphill gradient on the first half, but there are no major hills.

There's a great (and cheap) Mexican restaurant on the way back (Mr Taco's).

LET'S do both! We'll bike the path for about 20 miles, turn around and hit the restaurant on the way back.

This is a social bike ride - NOT a fast ride. I'm going to try to keep a 12 mph pace.

We'll meet right in front of the KMART parking lot and start biking. Can't find me? Make sure to take my cell # with you --- (401) 699-7304!
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red car and a red bike - Try my cell: 401-699-7304
item.name: BIKING Washington Secondary + Mr Taco ~ 40 miles
